lead_paragraph: Japan pledged $450 million in aid to island nations that are battling rising sea levels and natural calamities as a result of global warming.

headline.main: Japan: Climate Change Aid Pledged for Pacific Islands
headline.print_headline: Japan: Climate Change Aid Pledged for Pacific Islands

snippet: Japan pledged $450 million in aid to island nations that are battling rising sea levels and natural calamities as a result of global warming.
